other_title: Desert Punk - Il demone del deserto (Italian)
plot: In the future, Japan is a wasteland. In the Great Kanto Desert, scattered humans eke out a living in the hot sand. Among them, a short-statured man they call "Sunabozu" makes a living as a bounty hunter. Like a demon of the sand, he seems unbeatable. Yet, like all men, he has a particular weakness for the opposite sex...
opening_theme: "Sand Mission" by Hideaki Takatori and ZETKI (eps 1-12)
ending_theme: "Sunabouzu Ekaki Uta (How to Draw Sunabouzu)" by Hideaki Takatori (eps 1-12)
